00026 /*
00027  ВНИМАНИЕ:
00028  Используем stat(2) а не d_type из dirent.h, потому что этот параметр может не
00029  работать
00030  на всех файловых системах, в частности это касается raiserfs.
00031  */
00032 
00033 #include "Collection.hpp"
00034 
00035 static int filter(const struct dirent * dir) {
00036   if ((dir -> d_name[0] == '.') && (dir -> d_name[1] == 0)) {
00037     return 0;
00038   }
00039   if ((dir -> d_name[0] == '.') && (dir -> d_name[1] == '.')
00040       && (dir -> d_name[2] == 0)) {
00041     return 0;
00042   }
00043   return 1;
00044 }

00048   }

00051   }

00053   void Collection::open() {
00054     if (sqlite3_open("collection.db", &this -> db)) {
00055       cerr << "Can't open database: " << sqlite3_errmsg(db) << endl;
00056       this -> close();
00057       //    exit(1);
00058     }
00059   }
00060 
00061   void Collection::close() {
00062     sqlite3_close(this -> db);
00063   }
00064 
00065   void Collection::flush() {
00066     sqlite3_exec(this -> db, "DROP TABLE collection", NULL, NULL, NULL);
00067     sqlite3_exec(this -> db,
00068         "CREATE TABLE collection (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,"
00069           "fileName VARCHAR (255), title VARCHAR (255), artist VARCHAR (255),"
00070           "album VARCHAR (255), tracknum INTEGER )", NULL, NULL, NULL);
00071   }
00072 
00073   int Collection::scan(string path, int level) {
00074     if (!path.empty()) {
00075 
00076       if (chdir(path.c_str()) == -1) {
00077         //  if (errno == )
00078         //      cout << "Error to chdir() in Collection::Collection() " << endl;
00079       }
00080 
00081       struct dirent **namelist;
00082       struct stat statBuf;
00083 
00084       int n = scandir("./", &namelist, filter, alphasort);
00085 
00086       if (n >= 0) {
00087         int cnt;
00088         for (cnt = 0; cnt < n; ++cnt) {
00089 
00090           char currPathBuf[255];
00091           if (getcwd(currPathBuf, 254) == NULL) {
00092             perror("getcwd error");
00093           }
00094 
00095           string fullPathFileName_;
00096           string fullPathFileName = currPathBuf;
00097 
00098           fullPathFileName += "/";
00099           fullPathFileName_ = fullPathFileName;
00100           fullPathFileName += namelist[cnt] -> d_name;
00101 
00102           if (stat(fullPathFileName.c_str(), &statBuf) != 0) {
00103             cerr << "Error in stat() for file " << fullPathFileName << endl;
00104           }
00105 
00106           if (statBuf.st_mode & S_IFDIR) { // if dir
00107             scan(namelist[cnt] -> d_name, level + 1);
00108           }
00109 
00110           if (statBuf.st_mode & S_IFREG) { // if file
00111             string fileName = namelist[cnt] -> d_name;
00112             string ext = fileName.substr(((fileName.find(".", fileName.size()
00113                 - 5)) + 1), fileName.size());
00114             if (ext == "wav" || ext == "ogg" || ext == "flac" || ext == "wv") {
00115 
00116               fullPathFileName_ += this -> replace(fileName);
00117 
00118               string id = fullPathFileName;
00119               //            this -> audio -> openFile(fullPathFileName, id);
00120               //            this -> vorbisComm = this -> ddata -> getVorbisComment();
00121 
00122               std::string query = "INSERT INTO collection VALUES (NULL, \"";
00123               query += fullPathFileName_;
00124               query += "\", \"";
00125               query += "" /*this -> replace(vorbisComm["TITLE"])*/;
00126               query += "\", \"";
00127               query += "" /*this -> replace(vorbisComm["ARTIST"])*/;
00128               query += "\", \"";
00129               query += "" /*this -> replace(vorbisComm["ALBUM"])*/;
00130               query += "\", \"";
00131               query += "" /*this -> replace(vorbisComm["TRACKNUMBER"])*/;
00132               query += "\")";
00133 
00134               //            this -> audio -> closeF(id);
00135               //                   this -> audio -> flush();
00136               sqlite3_exec(this -> db, query.c_str(), NULL, NULL, NULL);
00137             }
00138           }
00139           //        free(namelist[cnt]);
00140         }
00141         //      free(namelist);
00142       } else {
00143         perror("Couldn't open the directory");
00144       }
00145       chdir("..");
00146     }
00147     return 1;
00148   }
00149 
00150   /*
00151    Заменяем все " на ""
00152    Нужно для SQLite ( ESCAPE )
00153    */
00154   string Collection::replace(string str) const {
00155     string::size_type pos = 0;
00156     while ((pos = str.find("\"", pos)) != string::npos) {
00157       str.erase(pos, 1);
00158       str.insert(pos, "\"\"");
00159       pos += 2;
00160     }
00161     return str;
00162   }
00163 }
